description: Delicious vegan burgers that are moist in texture.
name: Tasty Mushroom Burger Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g mixed mushrooms, washed, drained and chopped
1 small white onion, peeled and diced
4 medium sourdough buns, sliced in half

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a pan to a medium heat and then add 1 tsp of oil.
Fry the mushrooms, garlic and onion for 4 minutes and then remove from the heat.
Place the fried vegetables into a blender with the oats and seeds. Blend until smooth.
Now separate the mixture into 4 patties and pack tightly.
Add the rest of the oil to the pan and fry the burgers for 10 minutes, flip and cook for another 10 minutes.
Toast the buns for 3 minutes and serve with the burgers, chutney and rocket.
